articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Apex Legends NA finals postponed after suffering apparent RCE hack - Polygon
articles.description: Players in the North American finals for Apex Legends appeared to be given wall hack and aimbot cheats by hacker Destroyer 2009, despite Easy Anti-Cheat protection
articles.content:
The North American Apex Legends finals have been postponed after hackers appeared to give competitors cheats in the middle of tournament games, in an unprecedented attack on a major esports event.
